dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT sref3.shipment_refnum_value transloader, cv.charter_voyage_xid booking_number, sh.shipment_xid, cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value ramp_cutoff_date, cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_value port_cutoff_date, TO_CHAR( (CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date,cv.source_location_gid) END),'MM/DD/YYYY') sail_date, TO_CHAR( (CASE WHEN cv.dest_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.arrival_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.arrival_date,cv.dest_location_gid) END),'MM/DD/YYYY') eta_date, sh.total_ship_unit_count containers, (SELECT oob.order_base_xid FROM shipment_s_equipment_join ssej INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid WHERE ssej.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) contract_number, sref1.shipment_refnum_value business_unit, sref2.shipment_refnum_value commodity FROM shipment sh INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON sh.shipment_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' INNER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON CONCAT('SCOULAR/BCO.',sref.shipment_refnum_value) = cv.charter_voyage_gid INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON sh.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON sh.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref3 ON sh.shipment_gid = sref3.shipment_gid AND sref3.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.TRANSLOADER LOCATION NAME' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr1 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr1.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr1.domain_name='SCOULAR/BCO' AND cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_START RAMP CUTOFF TIME' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr2 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr2.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr2.domain_name='SCOULAR/BCO' AND cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_START PORT CUTOFF TIME' WHERE ((NOT cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value IS NULL AND to_date(cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value,'MM/DD/YY') <= SYSDATE - 1) OR (cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value IS NULL AND NOT cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_value IS NULL AND to_date(cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_value,'MM/DD/YY') <= SYSDATE - 1)) AND sh.consol_gid IS NULL AND sh.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND sh.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND sh.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND EXISTS (SELECT ssu.tag_3 FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ssu.tag_3 IS NULL) ORDER BY sref3.shipment_refnum_value
